author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and created sound design for this video of the streets of New York City in the 1930s., we see a constant flow of pedestrians moving through the crowded sidewalks, dressed in the elegant styles of the 1930s. Men in suits and hats, women in dresses and gloves create a vibrant portrait of daily urban life. Every corner seems alive with activity, with people chatting, window-shopping, and navigating the busy crossings. The traffic is just as fascinating, with vintage cars, trolleys, and even horse-drawn carriages sharing the same streets. The circulation is lively but surprisingly organized, with drivers skillfully maneuvering through intersections and pedestrians crossing amidst the movement. This glimpse into New York's past captures the rhythm and dynamism of a city that never sleeps.

ideo Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (
title: Wonderful  New York City 1930s in color [60fps, Remastered] w/sound design added
